message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe its value far exceeds $10000. However, for the sake of negotiation, I am proposing an initial offer of $15000 for this exceptional item. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your budget or if you would like to discuss further terms. I look forward to your response and the opportunity to provide you with a solution that exceeds your expectations.
